snippet: Rod R. Blagojevich, the former Illinois governor, takes a final turn in the spotlight before reporting to prison.
abstract: Former Illinois Gov Rod R Blagojevich is set to begin his 14-year term on corruption charges at low-security federal prison near Littleton, Colo.
lead_paragraph: Rod R. Blagojevich, the former Illinois governor, takes a final turn in the spotlight before reporting to prison.

headline.seo: Blagojevich to Begin Prison Term for Corruption
headline.main: On Eve of Prison, Blagojevich Keeps Talking, but Some Tune Out
headline.print_headline: On Eve of Prison, Blagojevich Keeps Talking, but Some Tune Out
